articles.author: Maxwell Zeff
articles.title: Meta confirms it may train its AI on any image you ask Ray-Ban Meta AI to analyze - TechCrunch
articles.description: We recently asked Meta if it trains AI on photos and videos that users take on the Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses. The company originally didn't have much to
articles.content:
We recently asked Meta if it trains AI on photos and videos that users take on the Ray-Ban Meta smart glasses. The company originally didn’t have much to say. 
Since then, Meta has offered TechCrunc… [+4073 chars]
